backend/main.mo: Canister backend defining user profiles and daily entries with access control, storage mixins, and CRUD operations for measurements, workouts, and profile data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a UI update task to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables and dark-mode styles applied across the frontend, including base resets and component tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication state, profile setup flow, theme enforcement, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/AboutView.tsx: Static informational view explaining app features with cards and navigation back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsView.ts: Analytics dashboard computing and rendering weight charts, rolling averages, and workout heatmap data based on backend queries.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders the main calendar, highlights days with saved content, and opens day detail or photo comparison modals.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Controls camera startup, lens preference, zoom, and error handling to capture photos for entries.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareD: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareS: Header component for comparison slots showing date, relative day offset, and a button to open a date picker.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailView.ts: Displays and edits a day's entry including photos, measurements, and workouts, with save and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Provides the app’s main navigation layout, switching between calendar, analytics, profile, and about views.
frontend/src/components/PhotoComparisonV: Shows side‑by‑side photo comparisons for three selected dates with configurable date slots and variance indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Collects initial user profile info such as name, age, gender, and units, then saves it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: Profile settings UI allowing users to view and update name, age, gender, and units, with save and logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, status tracking, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks wrapping backend queries and mutations for user profiles, entries, measurements, workouts, and comparisons.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables, dark mode definitions, calendar indicators, and toast overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page UI with branding, feature descriptions, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/utils/cameraErrorMapping.ts: Converts camera-related errors into normalized categories with user-friendly messages and blocking flags.
Attempts to select a standard rear camera using device heuristics, with fallbacks and PWA-specific safety checks.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Provides functions to detect installed PWA mode and Android Chrome environments for conditional behavior.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to backend nanosecond time, formatting dates, and calculating day offsets and variances.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and removing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, container settings, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state metadata including schema version, feature summary, and a list of implemented features with IDs, descriptions, and versions.
